info.title: DeskDirector
info.description: DeskDirector automates and accelerates ticket-based workflows between Users and Techs working IT services. The DeskDirector connector is a deep and powerful integration into our rich ticketing platform. All phases of a ticketâ€™s life cycle can be automated and enhanced for superior service experience.

post.description: Find ticket task templates by keywords or filters.
